Row.Text: I only had iced tea, is not it?

Rainforest tiles provide +1 adjacency bonus for Campus, Commercial Hub, Holy Site, and Theater Square districts. +2 [ICON_Culture] Culture from [ICON_RESOURCE_TEA] Tea, [ICON_RESOURCE_SUGAR] Sugar and [ICON_RESOURCE_SPICES] Spices.
Additional Military policy slot. +3 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production to each city with encampment. +2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture and +1 [ICON_AMENITIES] Amenity from entertainment to each city with an dam.

Levied units gain an ability giving them +2 [ICON_Movement] Movement and +5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength. It cost 75% less [ICON_GOLD] Gold and resources to upgrade Levied units. If you Levy troops from a City-State receive 2 [ICON_ENVOY] Envoys with that City-State. Combat victories provide [ICON_Culture] Culture and [ICON_Science] Science equal to 25% of the [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength of the defeated unit.(on Standard Speed)

All units receive +5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when attacking wounded units. Mines and quarry receive +1 [ICON_SCIENCE] Science if there is an adjacent Campus district. Buildings that provide additional yields when [ICON_POWER] Powered receive +2 of that yield.
I will beat you if you move.

All units gains +7 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when defending Ranged. Citizens may work Mountain tiles. Mountain tiles provide +2 [ICON_FAITH] Faith, +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food. +1 [ICON_FAITH] Faith to Mountain tiles for every adjacent Mine.

The soccer members who go home after the game.[NEWLINE]They are tired, and unfortunately run into a black-painted luxury car.[NEWLINE]To Miura who has all the responsibility to cover the juniors, [NEWLINE]What is the condition of the talk that the car owner, gang member Tanioka told?

All units gain +7 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when defending against ranged units. Citizens may work Mountain tiles. Mountain tiles provide +2 [ICON_FAITH] Faith, +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food. +1 [ICON_FAITH] Faith to Mountain tiles for every adjacent Mines.
Can employ a unique governor, KMR. +1 [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Route capacity for each Government Plaza building and the Government Plaza district. The Beast BB provide +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food.

Unlocks the Builder ability to construct a The Beast BB, unique to A Middsummer Lewd Dream.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold, +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture. +2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture when unlock the Computers. +2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold whe unlock the Social Media. Can be built on Adjecent Bonus or Luxury resources. Cannot be built on adjacent to another The Beast BB.
A Middsummer Lewd Dream unique improvement: The Beast BB

Koji Tadokoro unique Classical era melee unit. 3 [ICON_Movement] movement. this unit no need strategic resouces. this unit have unique primotion. +12 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength from Army units since the Industrial era.
Koji Tadokoro unique unit: Hakushin Karate Member
GO unique Classical era bombard unit that replaces the Catapult. Strongly beaten and generate ZOC.
TNOK unique Classical era light cavalry unit that replaces the Horseman. Stronger than Horseman. Double Flanking Bonus.
TNOK unique unit: Outlaw Black Horseman
TNOK unique Industrial era support unit. 5 [ICON_Movement] movement. Adjacent enemy units receive -5 [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength.
The Violence Man unique Medival ranged unit that replace Crossbowman. Stronger than the Crossbowman.
The Violence Man unique unit: Kunikuzushi

TDN unique Classical heavy cavalry unit. +10 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when there is a religious unit in the same hex. If this unit captures a city or is adjacent to a city when it is captured, the city will automatically adopt the Conquistador player's Religion as the dominant Religion.
MUR unique Medival anti cavalry unit that replace Pikeman. Melee class unit with a ranged attack, [ICON_Range] Range 2. Ignore unti-spear bonus.
Koji Tadokoro unique Modern era building that replaces the Shopping Mall. +1 [ICON_Amenities] Amenity. +100% [ICON_Tourism] Tourism from The Beast BB across your civilization.
Koji Tadokoro unique building: Rooftop Tanning Salon

GO unique Classical era building that replaces the Arena. +2 [ICON_Culture] Culture, +2 [ICON_Amenities] Amenity. Gain [ICON_CULTURE] Culture equal to 25% of the unit's cost when a non civilian unit is created in this city.

The Violence Man unique Medival era building that replaces the Workshop. +2 [ICON_Science] Science, +3 [ICON_Production] Production. +1 [ICON_GreatEngineer] Great Engineer point, +1 [ICON_GreatScientist] Great Scientist point.
The Violence Man unique building: Torture Workshop
TDN Man unique Medival era building that replaces the University. Bonus [ICON_Faith] Faith equal to the adjacency bonus of the Campus district. +1 [ICON_FAITH] Faith to resource tile in this city.
TDN unique building: Saint Paul's University

TDN Man unique Atomic era building that replaces the Stadium. Bonus [ICON_Amenities] Amenities extend to each city center within 9 tiles. This bonus applies once to a city, and multiple copies of this building within 9 tiles of a city center do not provide additional bonuses. +3 [ICON_Tourism] Tourism if the city [ICON_CITIZEN] population is 10 or higher and +5 [ICON_Tourism] Tourism if the city [ICON_CITIZEN] population is 20 or higher. International [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes from this city gain +4 [ICON_Culture] Culture.
TNOK unique District that replaces the Encampment. Provides +1 [ICON_Housing] Housing. +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold from the other adjecent districts. Grant 1 Tapioca Milk Tea.

MUR unique District that replaces the Aqueduct and cheaper to build. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]It provides this city with a source of fresh water from an adjacent River, Lake, Oasis, or Mountain. Cities that do not yet have existing fresh water receive up to 6 [ICON_Housing] Housing. Cities that already have existing fresh water will instead get +2 [ICON_Housing] Housing. If built adjacent to a Geothermal Fissure +1 [ICON_Amenities] Amenity. In all cases the Hamam provides an additional bonus of +1 [ICON_Housing] Housing and +1 [ICON_Amenities] Amenity. Prevents [ICON_Food] Food loss during Drought. Must be built adjacent to the City Center. Military Engineers can spend a charge to complete 20% of a Hamam's production. [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes with this city as a destination gain +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture.
